title: IM SO SICK OF THIS MMR SYSTEM!
body:
IM HERE TO RANT SO IF YOU DONT WANNA READ JUST GO...... I have been into my promos 9 times this week right? I HAVE LOST EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THEM TO FEEDERS AND AFK PLAYERS!!!!!!

I go on massive winning streaks then as soon as i hit promos its Lag,Afk players,DC or i get matched with really over powered players....... I have been constantly playing ranked for at least a year and i have been in bronze 5 for the entirety if that period.... i feel like every time i get close to getting out, its just trolls... feeders or lag. like some kind of curse that prevents me from winning. i am just so so so sick of loosing over and over i try and try and never get anywhere..... i ping when enemies leave lane, i watch the map to make sure i know where the enemy is so i can push, i have the correct positioning, i think about the other team and how their champs are played so i can counter build them, i stay positive and am rarely toxic, i encourage my teammates to keep them happy and playing well. i do not know what i am doing wrong here but im stuck in B5. i take positions people say they do not want, i support them as much as i can. I am at the point where i feel the system is rigged. i feel like something is matching me up with people who are constantly afk. and whats the deal with the toxic community.... i have had people say "i will slit your throat and drink your blood" and "i hope you get raped by your dad and starved everyday" this makes me sick to think that people think like that. and i have had report warning from people who blame me for loosing. one time i had a teammate who told the other team i was feeding intentionally ( which i was not ) so she managed to get the entire team to agree on reporting me. i think the report system is flawed.... mainly because it is way to easy to report people, players with a bad temper will just report people they do not like simply to take their anger out on them or something. because the report only takes a few clicks its too easy for players to abuse this. i think that the report system should be on the league of legends website so that you actually have to use a little bit of effort to report the players. this will reduce the amount of people who abuse the system.
